dream:
I dreamt I was leading children’s church. We basically started a gospel rave and the children started to get filled with the Holy Ghost, speaking in tongues. But the doors were closed so we had it under control. I was dancing with the kids, it was lit. We had a DJ instead of live music. The room was also dark with only rave lights and glow sticks.

The pastor was about to preach bout the youth room was right next door at the back of church by the entrance.

He told some of the ushers and ministers to speak to us to keep it down. But when they opened the doors, all the children ran out. We also had special needs children in the room so all the parents were asking me and the other helpers where they were. I told them they were running all about the church so then need to go find them.

The DJ doesn’t even know the kids left, he’s still bumping the music. So the sound is filling the church, service is disrupted and everything is in chaos. No one can even stop the DJ.

The head usher (a woman) makes an announcement for all off duty ushers to help in the youth room. All the other officers (I.e. ministers, deacons, missionaries, etc) start helping too.

This one boy is filled with the Holy Ghost, walking up the center aisle carrying his deaf and dumb little sister to the alter/pulpit. When they reach he drops his sister and she starts running around speaking in tongues.

The Pastor is still on the pulpit amazed at all that is happening.

There was this wheelchair bound boy.
The boy’s mother came up to me crying asking me where he was because she went to the room and all she found was his wheelchair. He was running around the church so I pointed at him but I left her because I was trying to help get the other kids under control.

She called her husband crying because she was happy he could walk again but she couldn’t get out the words since she was overwhelmed. Her husband thought something was wrong so he came to the church.

When he opened the door I yelled no but it was too late, his boy ran out the church and up the street. I told one of the ministers “call 911, I don’t know if I can catch him,” and ran after him. Mind you, I am full of the Holy Ghost with these kids, I just have self control cause I’m an adult.

I was in a skirt, dressed like a deacon but since I had to run full speed, the skirt ripped and my black heels broke off. The boy started running faster than the cars and I was trailing on the highway. Other people from church started following us in their cars to try and catch us. I remember this one white jeep looking car cause it looked like it was made in the 70s but it still had power. It looked like a church on wheels for a car.

We start running on the highway but we are catching up with the cars. Everyone going like 40 mph but they are still amazed we’re catching up and running faster.

We started a high speed chase on the highway but the reporters started cursing while reporting cause they couldn’t believe we were on foot. They would say “wtf, is this real” or “you gotta be shitting me, are you lying?”

People are are trying to livestream and record us for social media as we run past their cars.

The cops couldn’t catch up with us after a while and the helicopter cam was starting to have trouble keeping up. Cops are trying to clear the highway and stop us before we leave the state.

A black suv Lincoln shows up and bolts past the cops, it’s the pastor’s car. The pastor, the head usher woman, another minister woman and deacon man came driving beside us. They try talking the boy down but because they’re warriors, them speaking to him actually empowers him to run faster.

They tell me I need to catch him but I tell them I can’t keep up. They say for me to run in front of the car and they will push me, so I do.

When I finally get close enough to grab the boys hand, the connection turns him into a ball of speed white fire. And you see bolt of regular flame that is me trailing behind him as he drags me. I tell God that I can’t stop him so He said He would strengthen me. I’m only hearing God as I watch like from the camera view of the helicopter. 

I transform into a ball of flaming sunset colors and instantly keep up behind the boy. The head usher gets the idea that everyone in the car should hold hands. She climbs on the hood and the pastor holds her left hand since he’s driving, the second holds her right and the deacon lady is in the middle inside the car. But I also feel like someone is on top of the car to keep the usher from falling off but it’s 4. When they connect their car catches up to us.

We look like a straight line of fire on the highway.

The president gets word and sends the army for us. They said they were gonna bomb us but someone told the army that we were people.

Before I woke up I heard someone whisper “the power of 4”.
interpretation:
This dream is filled with vivid symbolism and imagery, so let's break it down:

The dream starts with you leading children's church, which symbolizes your role in guiding or nurturing others. The gospel rave and the children getting filled with the Holy Ghost represent an atmosphere of spiritual ecstasy and connection with the divine. The closed doors symbolize control and containment, suggesting that this experience is happening within a particular setting or under certain conditions.

The presence of a DJ instead of live music and the dark room with rave lights and glow sticks suggest a modern and energetic approach to worship and religious experiences.

The interruption and chaos begin when the doors are opened and the children run out. This represents a loss of control and a disruption of the intended order. The special needs children running around the church may reflect the idea that spiritual experiences are not limited to specific individuals or groups.

The fact that the DJ is unaware of the chaos and continues playing music symbolizes the persistence of spiritual energy even in the midst of disturbances.

The involvement of the head usher and other church officers in trying to control the situation suggests the need for authority figures to intervene and restore order.

The boy carrying his deaf and dumb little sister to the altar, where she starts speaking in tongues, signifies the power of the Holy Spirit to overcome limitations and disabilities.

The mother of the wheelchair-bound boy finding his wheelchair empty but then witnessing him running and walking represents a sense of liberation, transformation, and healing.

Your pursuit of the boy who runs away, with others from the church joining you, showcases the determination and desire to bring someone back to safety and control.

The torn skirt and broken heels may symbolize the sacrifice and physical limitations you experience in your pursuit. However, you remain filled with the Holy Spirit and able to maintain self-control.

The high-speed chase on the highway, the amazement of onlookers, and the presence of reporters suggest that the extraordinary nature of the situation is attracting attention and curiosity.

The inability of the authorities (cops and helicopter) to catch up with you, as well as the mention of livestreaming and social media, implies that this spiritual experience transcends the limitations of worldly power and awareness.

The arrival of the pastor's car with the head usher, minister, and deacon seems to represent a higher level of spiritual authority and guidance. However, their attempts to reason with the boy only make him stronger, suggesting that the spiritual journey requires a personal connection and surrender to a higher power.

Your transformation into a ball of flaming sunset colors and ability to keep up with the boy symbolize your empowerment and alignment with the divine. The connection between you and the boy turns him into a ball of white fire, representing a shared connection and acceleration of spiritual energy.

The idea of holding hands to maintain connection and speed highlights the need for unity and support in spiritual journeys. The mention of "the power of 4" at the end suggests that there is strength and significance in the number four, potentially referring to stability, balance, or the four elements.

The mention of the president sending the army and their intention to bomb you but then realizing that you are people signifies a misunderstanding or underestimation of the power and spiritual nature of your journey.

Overall, this dream seems to convey themes of spiritual ecstasy, disruption, healing, guidance, perseverance, and the transcendence of worldly limitations. It suggests that there is a powerful spiritual journey, perhaps guided by a higher power, where unity, surrender, and connection with the divine lead to transformative experiences.
title: "The Gospel Rave: Children Filled with the Holy Ghost"

dream: i had a dream about a snake
interpretation:
Dreams about snakes can have a variety of meanings depending on the context and personal associations of the dreamer. In general, snakes often represent transformation, hidden fears or desires, and powerful instincts. Here are a few possible interpretations:

1. Transformation: Snakes are commonly associated with shedding their skin, representing the cycle of rebirth and personal growth. This dream may indicate that you are going through a transformative period in your life and are ready to shed old beliefs or behaviors.

2. Hidden fears or desires: Snakes can also symbolize subconscious fears or desires that have not been fully acknowledged. The presence of a snake in your dream could be a sign that there are hidden feelings or concerns that need to be addressed and confronted.

3. Intuition and instinct: Snakes are often seen as symbols of wisdom and intuition. Your dream may be telling you to trust your instincts and rely on your intuition in certain situations.

4. Sexual symbolism: Snakes have long been associated with sexuality and desire. Therefore, a dream about a snake may represent sexual desires or passions that are currently present in your life.

Remember, dream interpretations are subjective, and the meaning of your dream ultimately depends on your own personal experiences and associations with snakes. It can be helpful to reflect on the emotions and events surrounding the dream to gain further insight into its specific meaning for you.
title: "Slithering Omens: A Mesmerizing Encounter with a Serpent in the Dream Realm"

dream: I dreamt that I was in a camp with my family. My husband Bobbie was also there. He helped people transition.
interpretation:
Dreams can have various interpretations, and the meaning can vary depending on the individual and their unique circumstances. However, based on the details provided, we can explore some possible interpretations for your dream.

The fact that you were in a camp with your family suggests a sense of togetherness, unity, and support. It may symbolize your desire for strong familial connections or a need for bonding experiences.

The mention of your husband, Bobbie, being present and helping people transition could indicate that you rely on and admire his support and guidance. Bobbie's role in helping others transition could represent his ability to adapt and facilitate change in various situations.

This dream might also reflect your own desire or ability to aid others with their own personal transformations or life transitions. It could imply that you possess valuable skills or qualities that allow you to empathize with and assist others during significant changes or challenges.

Additionally, the camp setting suggests a temporary or transitional state. This might imply that you are currently going through a period of change or self-development. The dream could be encouraging you to embrace these transitions and grow from them, just as Bobbie is helping others transition in your dream.

Overall, this dream may reflect your family's support, your admiration for your husband, and your innate ability to assist others during times of transformation. However, only you can truly determine the specific meaning and significance of this dream based on your personal experiences, emotions, and current life circumstances.
title: "A Family's Camp Journey: Bobbie's Transformation Assistance"

dream:
I had a very weird dream last night. At first  record I knew the second part but then I remembered the first part. I was set a summer camp style area that I was at but anyway I was in a big bathroom I like some dorm bathrooms to set up my other schools you like our bunch of toilets out, showers out, and the way that the toilets were like 2 walls with 2 kinds of short walls probably come up low but higher than your waist and that's it. And so I was in the bathroom and I'm trying to do things to not touch the toilet seat so I'm like I balancing my feet like on the little bars on the wall to try hover over the toilet seat to pee. And then I remember peeing, then I remember this guy came by, have no idea who the guy is, think he was white, have no idea what the dude is and the dude came and he was like "you know it would be so funny if we acted like we had sex right now" and I was like "you know okay" And so my legs were spread and I was trying to balance myself over the toilet seat. And then he started to do the motions of sex, we wasn't actually doing it, and then like other people they caught us and saw what we was doing and they were kind of just looking so yeah so that happened. And so he was like standing in front me, there was space between us, he was pumping his waist it's how men do when they have sex. and then I just have to my legs open I think I moved them a little but there was space between us like, we wasn't even like touching each other. But other people was like "are you having sex" I don't know the reaction of the people was very casual.

The second part me and Erika was staying in my dorm, had a very orange tint how it looks like a very bad storm. The Sky it's like Orange stuff and It look like that and we was in the room together and was packing up for something I remember a lot of stuff on my bed and I start putting my pillow under my bed and start putting my blanket start putting like all my things like in my suitcase I just like my stuff in general and try to put it to a side so I can Clear off my bed and the only thing left on my bed was really like my mattress and the sheet that goes on top of it that's it.

And she does the same thung because her stuff was in my dorm for some reason. So it's like we packing and then you know it's like the thing that we both know like I know something going wrong on campus, really bad, violence in the halls, so we were like let's pack up for this. And I'm first we look out the window and I remember it was like let's take the stuff off the bed so we'll be able to reach the window. And the window was higher and we did that And then we were like ok let's lock our doors, so we have connecting bathrooms. and so I locked my main door from the inside, I go to my suitemates door to lock the door from her side it from inside the bathroom, and it hers won't lock it's very loose like a try to push it in and try to lock it I can't so all I can do is lock my door. I lock my door from the inside of my room so my bathroom door is locked and my room door is locked. Erika says a short prayer And then I remember she tries to like talk like a general and I'm like "Erica bro you can't talk cannot to me I like I'm stressed" and she goes quiet respectively and then we start hearing noise outside so we're like ok whats going on, so I look under the door like it was like a huge gap under my door that's so I could see what was going on. So I looked under my door and there's a big mob big crowd of students and they're at the end of the hallway and everybody's fussing around, yelling and getting all rowdy and I'm like OK and then I hear and see this girl pull out a chainsaw And I hear a chain saw sound and she throws it at somebody's arm and that's what I knew like okay cause in general like we knew it was starting to get violent outside or something was happening in the halls or campus and it was so bad and I literally woke up with my heart pounding it was terrifying.
interpretation:
Dreams can often be a reflection of our subconscious thoughts, emotions, and desires. This dream seems to be a combination of different elements and scenarios. 

The first part of the dream, with the summer camp-style area and the bathroom, may symbolize feelings of vulnerability and discomfort in a particular situation or environment. The struggle to avoid touching the toilet seat suggests a desire to maintain cleanliness or hygiene in uncomfortable or unfamiliar circumstances.

The presence of the unknown guy and the suggestion of acting out a sexual act may signify a desire for excitement or experimentation in your waking life. It could also represent a need for attention or validation from others.

The reactions of the other people in the dream may reflect your concerns about how others perceive you or fear of judgment.

The second part of the dream, with the orange-tinted room and the need to pack up and prepare for something bad happening on campus, suggests a sense of impending danger or uncertainty. This could symbolize underlying anxieties or concerns about your safety and security in your current environment or certain aspects of your life.

The inability to lock the suitemate's door may signify a lack of control or protection over your personal boundaries. The prayer and attempt to communicate with Erica indicate a search for comfort and support during a challenging situation.

The appearance of a mob of students and the violent act with a chainsaw may represent the feeling of being overwhelmed or threatened by a chaotic or aggressive situation. The fear and heightened emotions in this part of the dream may reflect your own fears or anxieties about violence or conflict in your waking life.

Overall, this dream may be highlighting feelings of vulnerability, discomfort, uncertainty, and the need for control and protection. It is important to consider the specific circumstances and emotions surrounding your life when trying to interpret the meaning of your dream more precisely.
title: "Bathroom Balancing Act: A Surreal Summer Camp Encounter and Dorm Room Dystopia"

dream: When I was young my family and I went on a cruise ship, in the ship was a store that smelled clothes and these leather outfits that all my family had worn except me and when you put on the outfit you turned evil. And everybody that had put them on the outfits turned into Ana army that attacked everyone in the cruise ship.
interpretation:
The dream you have described could have various symbolic interpretations, as dreams are highly personal and subjective. However, I can provide you with some possible meanings to consider:

1. Fear of Being Left Out: The fact that everyone in your family had worn the leather outfits except for you could represent a fear of feeling left out or excluded from certain experiences or dynamics within your family or social circle.

2. Transformation and Evil: The act of putting on the leather outfit and turning evil could symbolize a fear of change or transformation. It may suggest that you have concerns about the negative or "evil" aspects that can arise from altering your identity or becoming someone different.

3. Repressed Aggression: The image of the army attacking everyone on the cruise ship could reflect repressed feelings of aggression or hostility within yourself or others around you. It is possible that you are witnessing or experiencing hostility or conflict from those around you and fear the potential consequences.

4. Overwhelmed by Negative Influences: Being on a cruise ship is often associated with relaxation and enjoyment. However, in your dream, the negative influence of the outfits turns the experience into chaos. This could indicate that you feel overwhelmed or negatively impacted by certain external influences in your waking life, which may be interrupting your sense of peace or enjoyment.

Ultimately, it is important to remember that dreams are highly personal, and only you can fully understand their true meaning. Reflecting on your current emotions, experiences, and relationships may help provide further insight into the symbolic meaning of this dream.
title: "Corrupted Attire: A Malevolent Family Curse Unleashed on a Sinister Cruise Ship"

dream: I always dream about my crush but in my dreams I never talks to him. I always admire him from afar
interpretation:
Dreams about your crush can represent your desire for a closer connection with them or your longing to express your feelings. However, the fact that you never talk to your crush in your dreams and admire them from afar may suggest feelings of shyness, insecurity, or fear of rejection in your waking life. It's possible that you hesitate to approach your crush in real life due to these emotions. 

Alternatively, this dream could indicate that you idealize your crush and put them on a pedestal. Your subconscious may be projecting an image of them as unattainable, leading you to admire them from a distance rather than taking action.

Overall, this dream may reflect your inner conflict between the desire for a romantic connection with your crush and the fear of potential rejection or disappointment. It can be helpful to reflect on these emotions and consider making small steps towards engaging in conversation with your crush to overcome your apprehensions.
title: "Dreaming in Silence: Unrequited Admiration for My Crush"

dream: I had a dream that a disease that turned people into zombies that spread the infection by breathing gas in people's mouths
interpretation:
Dreams about zombies and infection often represent feelings of vulnerability, fear, or being overwhelmed by something in your waking life. Your dream may be an expression of anxiety or a metaphor for a certain situation. The disease turning people into zombies could symbolize a fear of losing control or being influenced by others in a negative way.

The method of infection through breathing gas into people's mouths could indicate a sense of powerlessness or feeling overwhelmed by external influences or pressures. It may suggest that you feel someone or something is imposing their beliefs, opinions, or actions on you, causing you to lose your individuality or sense of self.

This dream could be a reflection of your concerns or anxieties about being influenced or manipulated by others. It could be helpful to explore any situations in your waking life where you may feel like your autonomy or personal boundaries are being challenged. Evaluating these factors might lead you to a better understanding of the underlying emotions or external influences that are manifesting in this dream.
title: "The Breath of Undead: A Dream of a Terrifying Zombie Pandemic"

interpretation:
Dreams about wanting to be rich typically symbolize desires for financial security, abundance, and a comfortable lifestyle. However, the meaning can vary depending on the specific details and emotions associated with the dream. Here are a few possible interpretations:

1. Materialistic Desires: This dream may reflect your real-life ambition and longing for wealth and material possessions. It could indicate that you are striving for success, financial independence, and a higher social status.

2. Financial Insecurity: On the other hand, wanting to be rich in a dream could signify concerns or fears about your current financial situation. It might be an indication that you are worried about not having enough money to support yourself or achieve your goals.

3. Personal Fulfillment: Being rich in a dream can also symbolize personal fulfillment and a desire to live a more lavish and fulfilling life. It suggests a longing for experiences, opportunities, and the freedom that financial abundance can bring.

It's essential to consider your personal circumstances and emotions to better understand the context and meaning of this dream. Additionally, other symbols or events within the dream may provide additional insights into its interpretation.
title: "Dreams of Wealth: Unleashing the Golden Fortune within"

dream: Dad lowering me in a Home Depot bucket on a fancy steel glass bridge down in to quicksand mud ravine in the dessert, I am in the bucket being lowered with a vaulting pole
interpretation:
Dreams are highly personal and can have different meanings for each individual. However, I can offer a possible interpretation for your dream.

Dreaming of your dad lowering you into a Home Depot bucket on a fancy steel glass bridge suggests a sense of trust and reliance on your father figure in challenging situations. Home Depot could symbolize a place associated with practicality and problem-solving.

The quicksand mud ravine in the desert may signify feelings of being stuck or overwhelmed in a difficult situation. The desert could represent a feeling of isolation or emptiness. The fact that it's quicksand suggests that you might be experiencing a situation that is slowly consuming your energy and progress.

The vaulting pole in your dream could symbolize your efforts to navigate this difficult situation. It implies that you are actively trying to find a way out or overcome obstacles.

Overall, this dream could indicate that you are facing challenging circumstances in your life, possibly feeling overwhelmed and stuck. However, with the support of your father figure and your own determination, you have the potential to overcome these difficulties and find a way forward. It may also suggest the need to seek practical solutions and rely on your problem-solving skills to overcome the obstacles you are facing.
title: "Daring Descent: Glide through Quicksand Ravine on a Steel and Glass Bridge, Aided by Dad's Home Depot Bucket"

dream: When I was young my family and I went on a cruise ship, in the ship was a store that smelled clothes and these leather outfits that all my family had worn except me and when you put on the outfit you turned evil. And everybody that had put them on the outfits turned into Ana army that attacked everyone in the cruise ship.
interpretation:
This dream could symbolize feelings of exclusion or being left out within your family dynamic. The fact that everyone except you had worn the leather outfits and turned evil suggests that you may feel disconnected or different from your family in some way. It could also reflect a fear of being influenced by negative or destructive behavior exhibited by others around you.

The cruise ship represents the journey of life or a particular phase in your life. The presence of a store implies that there may be external influences or external pressures that are affecting your sense of self. The smell of the clothes could indicate a desire to fit in and conform to societal expectations.

The transformation of those wearing the outfits into an army that attacks everyone on the cruise ship suggests that you may perceive the negative influence of conformity or pressures to conform as harmful or even dangerous. It could be a reflection of your fear of losing your individuality or being swallowed up by negative behaviors or ideologies.

Overall, this dream may be highlighting feelings of isolation, fear of conformity, and the need to assert your own identity and values within your family or social environment. It's a message for you to stay true to yourself and not succumb to negative influences.
title: "Sinister Transformation: The Malevolent Saga of the Fateful Cruise Ship Outfits"
